DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether treatment anti-muscarinic medication follow sub-urethral sling procedure improve overall subjective objective outcome woman mixed incontinence primary stress symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Over Active Bladder Patients Having Sling Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age > /= 18 Patient appropriate suburethral sling procedure Mixed urinary incontinence No antimuscarinic therapy previous 30 day Uncontrolled narrow angle glaucoma Acute cystitis Unevaluated hematuria Currently use antimuscarinic therapy Unable complete preoperative urodynamics Contraindication anticholinergic therapy Unable unwilling complete diary quality life questionaire Significant ( exteriorize ) Pelvic Organ Prolapse
